trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Porter
There were no other sightings in Porter on or around April 27th 2008
divs: Sighting Detailsi have been staying up late evry night waiting to see if it would come back or not since the last time i saw it back in march. earlier this evening at 8:00pm 10:23pm i was out side on the porch with my daughter and periodically i would go and check if it was there or not it wasn't so after the mosquitos came out we went inside and i put my daughter to bed. well at 11:35ish my neibors daughter and her friend was back out side being really loud so i went back out side to tell them to keep it down and i went to the end of the porch to check and it was back. i stayed out there watching it till 12:20 pm the mosquitos were eating my feet up so i came inside to report it this time it is approximately in the same place but i would say if i put a measuring tape up towards the sky it would measure about an inch and a half(1.5") over to the right. from were it was the last time i saw it. but this time it is triple the size it was last time so i am assuming that means it is closer.
